Analysis of Force Transfer and Arching Effect

September 15, 2015

Overview

Making a comparison analysis of the arching effect and force transmission in a sand pile and in as silo stored with sand, by means of DEM (discrete element method)

Modeling and Simulation

Using PFC3D software to construct the model of sand pile and and silo stored with sand. Both the sand pile and silo contain sphere and non-sphere granule. Ignore viscosity and humidity. Assume friction coefficient is 0.5.

Result Analysis

Future Development

Modeling variety of granule (three or four spheres per granule)

Analysis of the contact force between the granule and the wall of the silo

Add more granule to get more precise result
